titleStmt.title: A true and short declaration both of the gathering and ioyning together of certaine persons, and also of the lamentable breach and division which fell amongst them.
titleStmt.author: Browne, Robert, ca. 1550-1633.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Browne by STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: lacking all after signature C₄.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
